protocol.text: The data were normalized with RMA algorithm using Gene-Spring GX default analysis settings ID_REF =  VALUE = Normalized RMA signal value
Mature leaves were sprayed with water or 50 uM dexamethasone
Arabidopsis plants were grown on soil (Metro Mix 360) at 22˚C under a 12/12 hr light/dark cycle for 4 weeks
The RNA was extracted with TRIzol (Ambion)
RNA probes were labelled using MessageAmp Premier RNA Amplification Kit (Ambion)
Following fragmentation, 10 ug of aRNA were hybridized on Affymetrix ATH1 GeneChip (Santa Clara, CA, U.S.A) for 16 hours at 45C with rotation at 60rpm.

Immediately following hybridization, the hybridized probe arrays undergo an automated washing and staining protocol on the GeneChip® FS450 fluidic station and are then scanned on the GeneChip® Scanner 3000 7G Plus where patterns of hybridization are detected.
